display.title: Land Before Time
description: &&3Suspicious Sand&&r found in &&2Warm Ocean Ruins&&r can be brushed to obtain a &&aSniffer&&r egg.
&&3Sniffer Eggs&&r can be placed to hatch in 20 minutes - or 10 minutes if placed on a &&eMoss Block&&r.
Once grown, &&aSniffers&&r will dig up seeds for for &&dunique decorative flowers&&r - the &&3Torchflower&&r and the &&3Pitcher Plant&&r.
&&7[Biome Sniffer]&&r &&aSniffers&&r will &&7resemble the biome they were hatched in&&r - collect them all!
